title: What do you look for in a champion?
body:
Hey everyone! I'm looking to see what the community tends to look for when they are picking a champion they like to play! Do you need sustain? Gap closer? Tanky? Let me know! :D
Personally I really like mobile champions, someone who has some sort of a dash like Yasuo, Riven, Fizz, ect. I also like all in champs such as Leona :) What about you guys?
